description: The AWS::GameLift::GameServerGroup resource creates an Amazon GameLift (GameLift) GameServerGroup.. Source:- https://github.com/aws-cloudformation/aws-cloudformation-resource-providers-gamelift.git

AutoScalingPolicy.description: Configuration settings to define a scaling policy for the Auto Scaling group that is optimized for game hosting
AutoScalingPolicy.title: AutoScalingPolicyDefinition

EstimatedInstanceWarmup.description: Length of time, in seconds, it takes for a new instance to start new game server processes and register with GameLift FleetIQ.
EstimatedInstanceWarmup.title: EstimatedInstanceWarmupDefinition

TargetTrackingConfiguration.description: Settings for a target-based scaling policy applied to Auto Scaling group.
TargetTrackingConfiguration.title: TargetTrackingConfigurationDefinition

TargetValue.description: Desired value to use with a game server group target-based scaling policy.
TargetValue.title: TargetValueDefinition

BalancingStrategy.description: The fallback balancing method to use for the game server group when Spot Instances in a Region become unavailable or are not viable for game hosting.
BalancingStrategy.title: BalancingStrategyDefinition

DeleteOption.description: The type of delete to perform.
DeleteOption.title: DeleteOptionDefinition

GameServerGroupName.description: An identifier for the new game server group.
GameServerGroupName.title: GameServerGroupNameDefinition

GameServerProtectionPolicy.description: A flag that indicates whether instances in the game server group are protected from early termination.
GameServerProtectionPolicy.title: GameServerProtectionPolicyDefinition

GameServerGroupArn.description: A generated unique ID for the game server group.
GameServerGroupArn.title: GameServerGroupArnDefinition

InstanceDefinitions.description: A set of EC2 instance types to use when creating instances in the group.
InstanceDefinitions.title: InstanceDefinitionsDefinition

InstanceDefinition.description: An allowed instance type for your game server group.
InstanceDefinition.title: InstanceDefinitionDefinition

WeightedCapacity.description: Instance weighting that indicates how much this instance type contributes to the total capacity of a game server group.
WeightedCapacity.title: WeightedCapacityDefinition

LaunchTemplate.description: The EC2 launch template that contains configuration settings and game server code to be deployed to all instances in the game server group.
LaunchTemplate.title: LaunchTemplateDefinition

LaunchTemplateId.description: A unique identifier for an existing EC2 launch template.
LaunchTemplateId.title: LaunchTemplateIdDefinition

LaunchTemplateName.description: A readable identifier for an existing EC2 launch template.
LaunchTemplateName.title: LaunchTemplateNameDefinition

Version.description: The version of the EC2 launch template to use.
Version.title: VersionDefinition

MaxSize.description: The maximum number of instances allowed in the EC2 Auto Scaling group.
MaxSize.title: MaxSizeDefinition

MinSize.description: The minimum number of instances allowed in the EC2 Auto Scaling group.
MinSize.title: MinSizeDefinition

RoleArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for an IAM role that allows Amazon GameLift to access your EC2 Auto Scaling groups.
RoleArn.title: RoleArnDefinition

Tags.description: A list of labels to assign to the new game server group resource.
Tags.title: TagsDefinition

Key.description: The key for a developer-defined key:value pair for tagging an AWS resource.

Value.description: The value for a developer-defined key:value pair for tagging an AWS resource.

VpcSubnets.description: A list of virtual private cloud (VPC) subnets to use with instances in the game server group.
VpcSubnets.title: VpcSubnetsDefinition

GameServerGroup.description: Properties that describe a game server group resource. A game server group manages certain properties of a corresponding EC2 Auto Scaling group.
GameServerGroup.title: GameServerGroupDefinition

AutoScalingGroupArn.description: A generated unique ID for the EC2 Auto Scaling group that is associated with this game server group.
AutoScalingGroupArn.title: AutoScalingGroupArnDefinition

CreationTime.description: A timestamp that indicates when this data object was created.
CreationTime.title: CreationTimeDefinition

LastUpdatedTime.description: A timestamp that indicates when this game server group was last updated.
LastUpdatedTime.title: LastUpdatedTimeDefinition

Status.description: The current status of the game server group.
Status.title: StatusDefinition

StatusReason.description: Additional information about the current game server group status.
StatusReason.title: StatusReasonDefinition

AutoScalingPolicy.description: Configuration settings to define a scaling policy for the Auto Scaling group that is optimized for game hosting

BalancingStrategy.description: The fallback balancing method to use for the game server group when Spot Instances in a Region become unavailable or are not viable for game hosting.

DeleteOption.description: The type of delete to perform.

GameServerGroupName.description: An identifier for the new game server group.

GameServerProtectionPolicy.description: A flag that indicates whether instances in the game server group are protected from early termination.

InstanceDefinitions.description: A set of EC2 instance types to use when creating instances in the group.

LaunchTemplate.description: The EC2 launch template that contains configuration settings and game server code to be deployed to all instances in the game server group.

MaxSize.description: The maximum number of instances allowed in the EC2 Auto Scaling group.

MinSize.description: The minimum number of instances allowed in the EC2 Auto Scaling group.

RoleArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for an IAM role that allows Amazon GameLift to access your EC2 Auto Scaling groups.

Tags.description: A list of labels to assign to the new game server group resource.

VpcSubnets.description: A list of virtual private cloud (VPC) subnets to use with instances in the game server group.

title: AWSGameLiftGameServerGroupProperties
